stillgfx(484, absY, absX -1); stillgfx(484, absY, absX +1); stillgfx(484, absY -1, absX); stillgfx(484, absY +1, absX); stillgfx(484, absY +1, absX +1); stillgfx(484, absY -1, absX -1); stillgfx(484, absY +1, absX -1); stillgfx(484, absY -1, absX +1); string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14074) { //attack startAnimation(1972); txt4 = "Eat 99 Atk!"; stillgfx(480, absY, absX); stillgfx(482, absY, absX);
